Posted By: Ava_Adore (5/2/2011 8:11:27 PM)
Rating:

@Perrlin: Look at the ability of Foresee "To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order." You are not searching for cards, you are merely looking at the top X cards of your library, ergo, you do not have to pay 2 for the Leonin Arbiter's ability.

The card itself, though, mana/titan ramp decks, BEWARE!! Garfield has sit his fat arse in your way to getting those nasty combos. Although, if you are playing R/G (as stated by previous comments) ramp you would save your burn spells for it. *COUGH*Arc Trail*COUGH*

posts.post_content:
For all you naysayers about this card and [Tunnel Ignus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tunnel Ignus) going to destroy Valakut Ramp...well, they're not. Any Valakut player worth their salt knows to save Bolts for these creatures. In addition, more lists are sideboarding [Memoricide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memoricide), removing all copies from the library.
  
   
HOWEVER, he is an amazing card. Got fetchlands? I got Arbiter, and those cards become dead weight.
